public class zeta.content.zirp.DeclAttr

(source file: DeclAttr.pizza)
java.lang.Object
   |
   +----zeta.util.Term

           +----zeta.content.zirp.DeclAttr
The pure class interface. 
public class DeclAttr
  extends Term
Declaration attribute annotation slots. This slot may be provided at NameDecl terms, and defines additional attributes for these names, as for instance the role of an mSZ schema.

Version: $Id: DeclAttr.pizza,v 1.2 1998/09/09 18:04:19 buessow Exp $

Alias(DeclAttr, String)
Attribute of MSZ Alias for a basic role.
Data
Attribute of MSZ Data schema definition.
Init
Attribute of MSZ Initialization schema definition.
Plain
Attribute of MSZ Plain schema definition.
Port
Attribute of MSZ Port schema definition.
Property
Attribute of MSZ Property schema definition.

slot
The slot object.

get(Annotation)
Get value of annotation slot.
isProvided(Annotation)
Test wether annotation slot is provided
put(Annotation, DeclAttr)
Set value of annotation slot.

Plain
public case Plain;
Attribute of MSZ Plain schema definition.

Data

public case Data;
Attribute of MSZ Data schema definition.

Port

public case Port;
Attribute of MSZ Port schema definition.

Init

public case Init;
Attribute of MSZ Initialization schema definition.

Property

public case Property;
Attribute of MSZ Property schema definition.

Alias

public case Alias(DeclAttr baseAttr,
                  String symbol);
Attribute of MSZ Alias for a basic role.

slot
public static final Slot slot;
The slot object.

put
public static void put(Annotation an,
                       DeclAttr attr);
Set value of annotation slot.

Parameters:
an - the annotation
attr - the name attribute

get

public static DeclAttr get(Annotation an);
Get value of annotation slot.

Parameters:
an - the annotation
Returns:
the name attribute, or null, if no one is provided.

isProvided

public static boolean isProvided(Annotation an);
Test wether annotation slot is provided.

Parameters:
an - the annotation
Returns:
true if the annotation slot is provided
